00008 #include "adc.h"
00009 
00010 //between 1 and 7 //do not know why 1 and 0 give both prescaler two
00011 volatile uint8_t adc_prescaler = 1;
00012 //register uint8_t adc_count asm("r3");
00013 volatile uint16_t adc_count = 0;
00014 volatile int8_t adc_stop_flag = 1;      
00015 
00016 volatile uint32_t adc_starttime = 0;
00017 volatile double adc_duration = 0;       //time for one sample point
00018 
00019 volatile uint8_t adc_channels = 1;  //nr_of_channels
00020 volatile uint8_t adc_current_channel = 1;
00021 
00022 
00023 SIGNAL(SIG_ADC){
00024     adc[adc_count] = ADCH;  //8bit
00025     if((++adc_count) == ADC_BUF_SIZE) adc_stop();
00026 }
00027 
00028 void adc_select_channel(uint8_t channel){
00029     //Input Channel selection; obersten beiden bits w√§hlen externe Referenz, wenn 0
00030     //=> ADMUX entspricht Channel
00031     ADMUX = (channel-1);// | (1<<ADLAR);
00032     ADMUX |= (1<<ADLAR);    //left-align bits to allow to read the 8bit-value from ADCH
00033 }
00034 
00035 void adc_LED(void){
00036     if(adc_channels == 1) PORTA = (PORTA & 15) + (8 << 4); //& 15: assign only first 4 bits
00037     if(adc_channels == 2) PORTA = (PORTA & 15) + (12 << 4); //& 15: assign only first 4 bits
00038     if(adc_channels == 3) PORTA = (PORTA & 15) + (14 << 4); //& 15: assign only first 4 bits
00039     if(adc_channels == 4) PORTA = (PORTA & 15) + (15 << 4); //& 15: assign only first 4 bits
00040 }
00041 
00042 //not tested yet!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
00043 void adc_off(void){
00044     PORTA = PORTA & 15; //sets the upper 4 bits to zero
00045 
00046     ADCSRA = 0;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void adc_set_nr_channels(int8_t nr){
00050     adc_channels = nr;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void adc_next_channel(void){
00054     adc_current_channel++;
00055     if(adc_current_channel > adc_channels) adc_current_channel = 1;
00056     adc_select_channel(adc_current_channel);
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 void adc_set_presc(int8_t presc){
00061     if(presc <= 7 && presc >= 1) adc_prescaler = presc;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066 void adc_single_channel(void){
00067     //fast measurement
00068     loop_until_bit_is_set(ADCSRA,ADIF);
00069     ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF);
00070     adc[0] = ADCH;
00071     for(uint16_t x=0; x < ADC_BUF_SIZE; x++){
00072         loop_until_bit_is_set(ADCSRA,ADIF);
00073         adc[x] = ADCH;
00074 //      adc_next_channel();
00075         ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF);
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void adc_multi_channels(void){
00080     //fast measurement
00081     loop_until_bit_is_set(ADCSRA,ADIF);
00082     ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF);
00083     adc[0] = ADCH;
00084     adc_next_channel();
00085     for(uint16_t x=0; x < ADC_BUF_SIZE; x++){
00086         loop_until_bit_is_set(ADCSRA,ADIF);
00087         adc[x] = ADCH;
00088         adc_next_channel();
00089         ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF);
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 void adc_init (uint8_t channel){
00095     adc_count = 0;
00096     adc_stop_flag = 0;
00097 
00098     adc_select_channel(channel);    //set the channel in the adc register
00099     adc_current_channel = channel;  //save the number of the current channel
00100     adc_LED();
00101 
00102     ADCSRA = adc_prescaler & 7;     //& 7: only assign first three bits
00103     //AD Enable, AD Start Conversion, AD Free Running, AD Interrupt Enable
00104     adc_starttime = us_time_get();
00105     ADCSRA |= (1<<ADEN) | (1<<ADSC) | (1<<ADFR);//interrupt method: | (1<<ADIE);
00106 
00107     if(adc_channels == 1) adc_single_channel();
00108     else adc_multi_channels();
00109 
00110     //stop adc again
00111     adc_stop();
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00117 void adc_stop (void) {
00118     ADCSRA &= ~(1<<ADSC) & ~(1<<ADFR) & ~(1<<ADIE);
00119     adc_stop_flag = 1;
00120 
00121     adc_duration = us_time_get_difference_d(adc_starttime) / ((double)ADC_BUF_SIZE / (double)adc_channels);
00122 }
00123 
00125 int8_t adc_stopped(void){
00126     return adc_stop_flag;
00127 }
